name: La Casa de las Madres
description: Emergency shelter, counseling, legal advocacy, and family support services
fullDescription: La Casa de las Madres provides comprehensive support services for individuals and families seeking safety, offering a 24/7 crisis line, emergency shelter, counseling, legal advocacy, and children's programs throughout San Francisco.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 crisis line support
- Emergency shelter services
- Individual and group counseling
- Legal advocacy and court accompaniment
- Children and youth programs
- Transitional housing assistance
- Economic empowerment programs
- Support in English and Spanish
howToGetIt:
1. Call 24-hour crisis line: 877-503-1850
2. Teen crisis line: 877-923-0700
3. Text line: 415-200-3575
4. Speak with trained advocate
5. Receive safety planning support
6. Access shelter and services as needed
